de.esoco.lib.property

Interface Fluent<T extends Fluent<T>>


  • public interface Fluent<T extends Fluent<T>>
    A base interface for classes that implement fluent method invocations, i.e. methods that return the instance they are invoked on.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T _with(java.lang.Runnable fUpdate)
      Returns this instance after applying an action.

    • Method Detail

      • _with

        default T _with(java.lang.Runnable fUpdate)
        Returns this instance after applying an action. This method is intended to be implemented by subclasses only, but because interface methods are always public it has been named with a leading underscore to emphasize this usage. Invoking this method externally won't harm but doesn't make sense because the action is provided as a runnable which can only have access to the invoked instance if it is created in it's context (or captures it). Using this method for other purposes is therefore discouraged as it may harm code readability.
        Parameters:
        fUpdate - The function that performs the fluent action
        Returns:
        This instance for fluent invocation
